description:
Place tiles with matching colors to make shapes and fill the board. Tessel is a colorful tile placement game. Place tiles with matching colors to make shapes and fill the board. The larger the shape, the higher the points. Choose from a wide range of tiling patterns to form endlessly varied tesselations:
  • Square
  • Triangular
  • Rhombille
  • Cairo pentagonal
  • Hexagonal
  • Deltoidal-trihexagonal
  • Penrose P3
  • Snub square
  • Ammann-Beenker
Features:
  • Play an easy square game, or choose a more challening pattern.
  • Customize your game settings to change the rules.
  • Create your own tiling patterns in the drawing tool.
